full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA nI RIL BU SGRUB THABS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNGS TU TSOGS MANG GIS MA nI RIL SGRUB 'PHRAL DU DGOS SKABS, ,BLA MA 'DZIN BYED RGYU ZUNG 'DUS ZHIG DGOS ZHES LAS SNA RNAMS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, DMIGS PA YID LA BYED TSUL SOGS GZHAN LAS SHES PAR BYA BA'I DBANG DU BYAS STE, DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU BRIS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
